Character.name: Kassie
Character.description: Tech expert with drone deployment. Provides surveillance and buffs. Great for tactical plays.
abilities: Scout Drone: Detects enemies in radius
Nano Support: Slight HP regen for team
Drone Mark: Highlights enemy for allies

Character.name: Clu
Character.description: Cyber-hacker with data manipulation skills. Disrupts enemy tech and boosts ally intel. Ideal for strategic disruption.
abilities: Data Hack: Disables enemy drones for 5s
Info Pulse: Reveals enemy positions briefly
Tech Overload: Increases ally skill recharge rate

Character.name: LUNA
Character.description: Mysterious lunar warrior with energy-based attacks. Harnesses moonlight for buffs. Suitable for night-time strategies.
abilities: Moonlight Surge: Boosts damage in low-light areas
Lunar Veil: Grants brief stealth at night
Starlight Heal: Restores slight HP under open sky

Character.name: Olivia
Character.description: Field medic with enhanced revive abilities. Teammates revive with more HP. Perfect for support roles.
abilities: Healing Touch: More HP after revive

Character.name: Shani
Character.description: Engineer who restores armor after kills. Gradually repairs vest. Good for extended fights.

Character.name: Sonia
Character.description: Scientist with revival capability. Delays fatal damage and allows counter. Ideal for clutch plays.
abilities: Nano Lifeline: Delays fatal hit for 3s
Survivor Boost: Slight attack boost when active
Final Spark: Counter burst before down

Character.name: Suzy
Character.description: Crime expert with bounty perks. Earns extra coins for kills. Perfect for store-based tactics.
abilities: Cash Kill: Earn FF coins per kill
Silent Heist: Enemy doesn’t detect earnings
Money Magnet: Short pickup radius boost

Men.name: Ford
Men.description: Former navy officer with storm resistance. Reduces damage taken outside safe zone. Great for survival strategy.
abilities: Sea Legs: Slight HP regen in danger zone
Endure: Bonus HP when outside safe zone

Men.name: Ignis
Men.description: Flame-wielding specialist. Unleashes a fire wall that burns enemies. Excellent for offensive pushes.
abilities: Flame Shield: Burns Gloo Walls and enemies
Heat Surge: Bonus damage vs cover

Men.name: Kairos
Men.description: Ex-soldier with EP-to-HP skills. Converts EP into HP during fights. Great for sustained duels.
abilities: Combat Surge: Fast EP to HP conversion

Men.name: Orion
Men.description: Mystical warrior with shield mode. Activates a red energy shield. Avoids damage and absorbs hits.
abilities: Crimson Shield: Invulnerable to damage briefly
Absorb: Restores HP from absorbed damage

Men.name: Oscar
Men.description: Stealth agent with mark resistance. Reduces detection from enemies. Great for sneak attacks.
abilities: Silent Path: Cannot be marked temporarily
Fade Step: Invisibility for 1s after crouch
Mask Signal: Blocks enemy drone view

Men.name: Ryden
Men.description: Gadget prodigy using spider bot. Releases a bot that slows enemies. Good for control and traps.
abilities: Spider Bot: Deploys and slows enemies
Nano Grip: Buffs reload when bot hits

Men.name: Santino
Men.description: Fashion icon with teleport dash. Leaves a dummy and teleports back. Great for ambush or escape.
abilities: Rewind Step: Create clone and return
Style Step: Clone explodes on swap

Men.name: Tatsuya
Men.description: Agile martial artist with lightning-fast strikes. Excels in close-quarters combat. Perfect for aggressive melee tactics.
abilities: Swift Strike: Increases melee attack speed
Dodge Reflex: Brief evasion boost after melee hit
Thunder Kick: Deals area damage on melee combo

Men.name: Wukong
Men.description: Monkey King with camouflage power. Transforms into a bush for stealth. Great for ambush tactics.
abilities: Surprise Strike: Bonus damage from bush
Bush Reset: Cooldown resets on kill

Pets.name: Agent Hop
Pets.description: A futuristic rabbit with energy powers. Helps gather EP while moving. Great for sustainability.
abilities: Bounce Charge: Gain EP after movement

Pets.name: Arvon
Pets.description: Mystic beast with dark energy. Enhances armor penetration. Ideal for aggressive playstyles.
abilities: Void Slash: Chance to ignore defense

Pets.name: Beaston
Pets.description: A powerful baboon. Boosts throwing range. Good for grenade strategies.

Pets.name: Colmillo
Pets.description: Fierce wolf companion. Drains HP from enemies. Supports aggressive players.
abilities: Vamp Fang: Converts damage to HP

Pets.name: Detective Panda
Pets.description: Sleuthing panda with investigative skills. Detects enemy movements and traps. Great for tactical scouting.
abilities: Sleuth Scan: Reveals enemy footsteps briefly
Cunning Boost: Increases ally detection range

Pets.name: Dr. Beanie
Pets.description: Speedy pet with sharp reflexes. Increases crouch speed. Great for stealth and cover use.

Pets.name: Dreki
Pets.description: Small dragon with thermal vision. Helps spot enemies using medkits. Ideal for scouting.

Pets.name: Falco
Pets.description: Flight bird companion. Increases gliding and dive speed. Perfect for faster landings.

Pets.name: Fang
Pets.description: Electric tiger with a roar. Reduces damage from explosives. Protects in tight battles.

Pets.name: Finn
Pets.description: Fish buddy with water-based powers. Boosts sprint speed after damage. Helps with escapes.

Pets.name: Flash
Pets.description: Tortoise with a defensive shell. Reduces damage from behind. Helps during retreats.

Pets.name: Hoot
Pets.description: Wise owl with vision powers. Reveals enemy traps and gear. Great for tactical play.

Pets.name: Kactus
Pets.description: Living cactus pet. Recovers EP when stationary. Suited for defensive strategies.
abilities: Root Guard: Boosts shield when still

Pets.name: Moony
Pets.description: Lunar-themed pet with calming aura. Enhances team morale and reduces debuffs. Ideal for support roles.
abilities: Moon Glow: Boosts ally morale briefly
Calm Aura: Reduces debuff duration for team
Lunar Shield: Grants minor damage resistance

Weapons.name: AN94
Weapons.description: Versatile assault rifle with balanced stats. High fire rate and moderate damage. Ideal for mid-range combat.
abilities: Rapid Fire: Increases fire rate briefly

Weapons.name: AWM
Weapons.description: High-damage sniper rifle for long-range combat. One-shot potential with precise aim. Suited for skilled marksmen.

Weapons.name: Bizon
Weapons.description: Submachine gun with high fire rate. Excels in close-quarters combat. Perfect for aggressive playstyles.
abilities: Rush Boost: Slight movement speed during fire

Weapons.name: CG15
Weapons.description: Energy-based weapon with charged shots. Deals bonus damage to shields. Great for tactical engagements.
abilities: Energy Burst: Extra damage to shields
Charge Pulse: Stuns enemies briefly on hit

Weapons.name: Gatling
Weapons.description: Heavy weapon with rapid, sustained fire. High ammo capacity for suppression. Ideal for holding positions.
abilities: Heavy Impact: Slows enemies on hit
Fortified Stance: Reduces recoil while stationary

Weapons.name: Shield Gun
Weapons.description: Defensive weapon that projects a temporary energy shield. Balances damage and protection. Suited for team support.
abilities: Deflect Shot: Reflects minor projectile damage
Shielded Reload: Faster reload behind barrier

Weapons.name: Trogon
Weapons.description: Hybrid shotgun with mid-range versatility. High burst damage with spread control. Great for dynamic fights.
abilities: Impact Force: Knocks back enemies on hit

Weapons.name: VSK94
Weapons.description: Sniper rifle with moderate damage and faster handling. Quick follow-up shots. Ideal for mobile snipers.
abilities: Steady Aim: Reduces sway during movement

Projectiles.name: FGL-24
Projectiles.description: Explosive grenade launcher with area damage. High impact for clearing groups. Suited for aggressive plays.
abilities: Shockwave: Slows enemies in blast zone

Projectiles.name: Flamethrower
Projectiles.description: Short-range weapon that deals continuous fire damage. Burns through cover. Ideal for close-quarters control.
abilities: Inferno Stream: Burns enemies over time
Heat Wave: Slows enemies in range

Projectiles.name: Flash Freeze
Projectiles.description: Cryogenic projectile that slows or immobilizes enemies. Creates ice patches. Great for area denial.
abilities: Frost Bind: Slows enemies on impact
Chill Effect: Reduces enemy reload speed

Projectiles.name: FF Knife
Projectiles.description: Throwing knife for quick, precise attacks. High damage on direct hits. Perfect for stealth eliminations.
abilities: Critical Strike: Bonus damage on headshots
Quick Draw: Faster knife throw rate

Projectiles.name: Gloo Melter
Projectiles.description: Specialized projectile that dissolves Gloo Walls. Disrupts enemy defenses. Ideal for countering fortifications.
abilities: Wall Dissolve: Destroys Gloo Walls instantly

Projectiles.name: Gloo Wall
Projectiles.description: Deployable cover with unique design (e.g., Death Incoming, Cute Mera, Sonic Eye, Dragon Seal). Essential for defense.

Projectiles.name: Grenade
Projectiles.description: Standard explosive projectile for area damage. Versatile for flushing out enemies. Suited for all playstyles.

Projectiles.name: Katana
Projectiles.description: Melee projectile for close-range combat. High damage with swift strikes. Perfect for aggressive melee tactics.
abilities: Slash Combo: Bonus damage on consecutive hits

Vehicles.name: Pickup Truck
Vehicles.description: Durable vehicle for squad transport. High capacity and defense. Ideal for team mobility.
abilities: Squad Boost: Slight team HP regen

Vehicles.name: Monster Truck
Vehicles.description: Heavy-duty vehicle with rugged design. High durability and terrain handling. Great for rough landscapes.
abilities: Terrain Master: No speed loss off-road

Vehicles.name: Speed Car
Vehicles.description: Sleek car built for speed. Boosts sprint speed. Suited for quick escapes.

Vehicles.name: Tuk Tuk
Vehicles.description: Compact vehicle for quick transport. Agile with moderate capacity. Perfect for urban areas.

Vehicles.name: Jeep
Vehicles.description: Versatile vehicle for all terrains. Balanced speed and durability. Great for squad strategies.
abilities: Team Sync: Slight team stamina regen

Vehicles.name: Sport Bike
Vehicles.description: Fast motorcycle for solo travel. High speed and agility. Ideal for rapid repositioning.

Vehicles.name: Sport Car
Vehicles.description: High-performance car for rapid movement. Fast with low defense. Suited for aggressive plays.

Vehicles.name: Vintage Car
Vehicles.description: Classic design with moderate speed and durability. Suitable for stylish transport.

Emotes.name: Aim Fire
Emotes.description: Combat-ready stance with weapon aiming animation. Shows precise targeting focus. Often used before engagements.

Emotes.name: Applause
Emotes.description: Cheering animation clapping hands. Celebrates victories or good plays. Increases team spirit.
abilities: Encore: Boosts nearby ally reload speed
Attention Grab: Enemies may focus you

Emotes.name: Arm Wave
Emotes.description: Energetic arm-waving greeting animation. Used to signal or cheer. Expresses friendliness or celebration.
abilities: Wave Burst: Nearby allies gain energy
High Morale: Boosts nearby HP regen

Emotes.name: Bon Appetit
Emotes.description: Mimics enjoying a delicious meal. Funny and lighthearted. Used in post-victory celebrations.

Emotes.name: Bring It On
Emotes.description: Taunting stance challenging enemies. Full of confidence. Used to provoke opponents.

Emotes.name: Chicken
Emotes.description: Flapping arms and clucking like a chicken. Mocking and humorous. Great for distracting opponents.

Emotes.name: Dab
Emotes.description: Quick dab motion popular in dances. Modern celebration style. Used after successful plays.
abilities: Hype Effect: Boosts nearby attack speed

Emotes.name: Dust Off
Emotes.description: Brushing shoulders clean motion. Confident victory celebration. Removes negative status effects.

Rare.name: Dust Off
Rare.description: Brushing shoulders clean motion. Confident victory celebration. Removes negative status effects.

Rare.name: Furious Slam
Rare.description: Aggressive animation with a powerful ground slam. Intimidates enemies and boosts morale. Ideal for post-kill taunts.

Rare.name: Greetings
Rare.description: A respectful hand gesture or wave. Used to acknowledge teammates or opponents. Friendly and sportsmanlike.

Rare.name: I Hate U
Rare.description: A dramatic gesture expressing dislike. Used to taunt or tease enemies. Bold and provocative.

Rare.name: Kungfu
Rare.description: Martial arts stance with combo moves. Stylish and powerful. Used to show off combat prowess.

Rare.name: LOL
Rare.description: Laughing animation holding stomach. Mocking defeated opponents. Boosts team morale slightly.
abilities: Morale Boost: Team reload speed up

Rare.name: Make It Rain
Rare.description: Throwing money in the air. Flashy and showy animation. Celebrates big wins or high scores.
abilities: High Roller: Increases item drop chance

Rare.name: Mind It
Rare.description: Cautionary gesture warning enemies. Conveys confidence and control. Great for psychological play.
abilities: Warning Signal: Reduces enemy movement speed

Rare.name: Shuffling
Rare.description: Energetic dance with rapid footwork. Boosts team morale and distracts enemies. Perfect for celebrations.
abilities: Rhythm Boost: Increases team movement speed

Rare.name: Top Scorer
Rare.description: Victory gesture holding a trophy. Celebrates being MVP or top player. Inspires teammates.

Advance.name: Wiggle Walk
Advance.description: Playful walking animation with exaggerated hip movements. Boosts team morale and distracts enemies. Great for lighthearted moments.
abilities: Quick Strut: Slight movement speed boost

Advance.name: Top DJ
Advance.description: Scratching records on turntables. Party vibe with beats. Used to hype up the team.
abilities: Beat Drop: Boosts ally attack speed

Advance.name: Threaten
Advance.description: Intimidating gesture to provoke enemies. Exudes dominance and draws attention. Ideal for aggressive taunts.
abilities: Fear Factor: Reduces enemy movement speed

Advance.name: The Swan
Advance.description: Graceful, elegant dance inspired by a swan. Calms allies and distracts enemies. Perfect for stylish plays.
abilities: Grace Aura: Reduces ally debuff duration
Serene Boost: Slight HP regen for team

Advance.name: Tease Waggore
Advance.description: Mocking animation with playful gestures. Taunts enemies and boosts ally confidence. Great for psychological warfare.

Advance.name: Tea Time
Advance.description: Relaxed animation of sipping tea. Calms allies and mocks enemies. Ideal for post-victory relaxation.
abilities: Calm Sip: Restores slight HP for team

Advance.name: Switching Steps
Advance.description: Dynamic dance with quick footwork. Increases team agility and distracts enemies. Perfect for high-energy moments.
abilities: Agile Step: Boosts team movement speed

Advance.name: Soul Shaking
Advance.description: Vibrant, energetic dance that uplifts allies and taunts enemies. Great for boosting team spirit after wins.
abilities: Soul Boost: Increases team attack speed
Energy Pulse: Slight HP regen for allies

Maps.name: Bermuda
Maps.description: Classic map with diverse terrain. Features urban areas, open fields, and coastal zones. Balanced for all playstyles.
abilities: Versatile Terrain: Slightly increased movement speed in urban areas
Resource Abundance: Higher loot spawn rate
Coastal Recovery: Slight HP regen near water

Maps.name: Kalahari
Maps.description: Desert map with open spaces. Suited for snipers and vehicle-based strategies. Challenging due to sparse cover.
abilities: Desert Vision: Improved visibility in sandstorms
Sniper’s Haven: Increased sniper rifle accuracy
Vehicle Boost: Faster vehicle speed on open terrain

Maps.name: Purgatory
Maps.description: Mixed terrain with water and hills. Ideal for stealth and ambush tactics. Features dense foliage and elevation.
abilities: Foliage Cover: Reduced detection in grassy areas
Ambush Advantage: Bonus damage from elevated positions
Water Glide: Faster movement in water

Maps.name: Alpine
Maps.description: Snowy map with verticality. Favors mobility and scouting strategies. Cold environment with urban and open areas.
abilities: Snow Camouflage: Reduced visibility in snowy areas
Vertical Edge: Faster climbing on cliffs
Frost Resistance: Reduced zone damage in cold areas
